infoModal.title: MNIST Digit Classification – Inference Visualization
infoModal.subtitle: Interactive Neural Network Visualization
infoModal.description: This application shows a compact Multi-Layer Perceptron (MLP) trained on MNIST. Draw a digit and observe how activations propagate in real-time through all fully connected layers.
infoModal.howItWorksDrawing: Click and drag in the 2D grid (top left) to sketch a digit
infoModal.howItWorksObserving: Track how your sketch travels through the network layers in 3D space
infoModal.howItWorksPrediction: Check the probability for each digit (0–9) in the chart (top right)
infoModal.colorCodingNodes: The color shows activation strength (dark blue tones for low/negative values, vibrant coral colors for strong positive activations)
infoModal.colorCodingConnections: Warm colors indicate strong positive contributions, cool tones negative influences, muted lines near zero.
infoModal.trainingStep1: Run python training/mlp_train.py to train the MLP (including Apple Metal acceleration, if available).
infoModal.trainingStep2: The script writes exports/mlp_weights.json, which the visualizer reads on load.
infoModal.trainingStep3: Change the number of hidden neurons, epochs, or export paths via the CLI options documented in training/mlp_train.py.
infoModal.realtimeActivations: Layer Activations: Sphere instances show activations per neuron with color-coded strength.
infoModal.realtimeConnections: Important Connections: Each target neuron highlights its strongest input weights for better readability.
infoModal.realtimeProbabilities: Live Probabilities: The bar chart updates logits → Softmax values in real-time.
infoModal.note: The network is intentionally kept compact to ensure smooth real-time rendering. Feel free to retrain with different layer sizes – just keep the architecture lean so the 3D view remains responsive.

advancedSettings.title: Advanced Settings
advancedSettings.maxConnectionsHint: Controls how many of the strongest incoming weights per target neuron are displayed simultaneously; high values may slow down rendering.
advancedSettings.hideWeakConnectionsHint: Hides connections with low absolute weight; 0 shows all connections.
advancedSettings.connectionThicknessHint: Adjusts the radius of connection cylinders; higher values make all lines visibly thicker.
advancedSettings.brushThicknessHint: Smaller values create finer lines; larger values fill the grid faster.
advancedSettings.brushStrengthHint: Determines how much a brush stroke increases pixel brightness.
